title: Calendar
author: twapi
aiHeadline: Prepare for the future by meticulously planning your 2026 calendar, because nothing says 'I'm in control' like knowing what day of the week January 1st will fall on.

title: Growing up in “404 Not Found”: China's nuclear city in the Gobi Desert
author: Vincent_Yan404
aiHeadline: Discover the fascinating tale of growing up in '404 Not Found,' a hidden nuclear city in the Gobi Desert where even Google Maps says, 'I can't find that place,' but it's real, and it's China's secret.

title: What an unprocessed photo looks like
author: zdw
aiHeadline: Witness the raw, unfiltered truth of what your photos really look like before Instagram filters, because apparently, we've all been living in a digital lie.

title: Last Year on My Mac: Look Back in Disbelief
author: vitosartori
aiHeadline: Relive the glory days of your Mac usage from last year, because who doesn't want to relive the pain of slow performance and endless updates?

title: Building a macOS app to know when my Mac is thermal throttling
author: angristan
aiHeadline: Finally, an app to tell you when your Mac is slowing down because it's too hot, because who doesn't want to know their computer is basically having a heat stroke?
